mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todo_attachments (todo_id, original_filename, stored_filename, content_type, size, uploaded_at) VALUES (#{todo.id}, #{originalFilename}, #{storedFilename}, #{contentType}, #{size}, #{uploadedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, todo_id, original_filename, stored_filename, content_type, size, uploaded_at FROM todo_attachments WHERE todo_id = #{todoId} ORDER BY uploaded_at DESC
